chapters.title: Chapter 1: Leaving the Prophet
chapters.info: Ailron, p. 95 (97)—King of Amadicia until the Seanchan invaded. He was not as strong as most kings due to the control of the Children of the Light—in fact, he had almost no real power at all. During the invasion, he took his army to engage the invaders near Jeramel; they were slaughtered, and Ailron himself was captured. See also Niall, Pedron; Valda, Eamon.
